${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:ClimbingBackpack.NAME: 登山背包
${modID}:ClimbingBackpack.FLAVOR: 就是这样，Madeline。只需呼吸。为什么你这么紧张？
DESCRIPTIONS: 在每场战斗开始时，将一张 #y深呼吸 放入你的手牌。

${modID}:PointlessMachines.NAME: 不知所谓的机器
${modID}:PointlessMachines.FLAVOR: 第一章 A 面蓝心。
DESCRIPTIONS: 你每打出一张 #y冲刺 ，就获得 #b
张 #y冲刺 后这件遗物将被替换。

${modID}:HeavyAndFrail.NAME: 沉重与脆弱
